import axios from'axios';class PlatformService{constructor(){// Use environment variable with fallback
this.baseURL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||'';this.platformsURL=`${this.baseURL}/api/platforms`;this.contentURL=`${this.baseURL}/api/content`;}// Platform methods
async getUserPlatforms(){try{const response=await axios.get(this.platformsURL);return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching platforms:',error);throw error;}}async addPlatform(platformData){try{const response=await axios.post(this.platformsURL,platformData);return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error adding platform:',error);throw error;}}// Content methods
async addContent(contentData){try{const response=await axios.post(this.contentURL,contentData);return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error adding content:',error);throw error;}}async getContentByPlatform(platformId){try{const response=await axios.get(`${this.platformsURL}/${platformId}/content`);return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching content:',error);throw error;}}}export default new PlatformService();
